title: IT Support Specialist
description: Install and configure software and hardware solutions, focusing on client digital signatures and overall technological support.
details: Provide technical support to employees regarding software, hardware, and network-related issues. Troubleshoot and resolve IT problems promptly to minimize downtime.
qualification: Experience in software and hardware management.

title: Receptionist/Administrator
description: Handle both incoming and outgoing calls.
details: Provide administrative support with basic IT knowledge. Able to speak English and Telugu.
qualification: Good communication skills.

title: Domestic IT Recruiter
description: Proficiency in using job portals and applicant tracking systems (ATS).
details: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, IT, or related field.
qualification: Experience in IT recruitment.

title: IT Helpdesk Coordinator
description: Serve as the first point of contact for internal IT-related inquiries.
details: Provide support via phone, email, or ticketing system.
qualification: Experience in IT helpdesk support.

title: IT Executive
description: Provide technical support to employees regarding software, hardware, and network-related issues.
details: Troubleshoot and resolve IT problems promptly to minimize downtime.
qualification: Experience in IT support and administration.

title: Freshers Hiring for IT Positions - Pronix Talent Hunt
description: Software Development Engineers (Entry Level/Junior Level).
details: Involvement in Software Development Life Cycle, Agile/Scrum Development.
qualification: Knowledge in .NET/Angular/React/API/Python/SQL.

title: IT Support Engineer
description: Experience in telephony – Pbx/IP / networking /wifi.
details: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Technology, or similar.
qualification: 1-2 years of relevant experience.

title: Assistant Manager - IT
description: Daily monitoring of servers and network.
details: Administering Windows Server 2022 (Active Directory, Group Policy, DHCP, DNS, WDS, WSUS, printer pooling, Hyper-V, etc.).
qualification: Experience in server and network administration.

title: IT Executive
description: Provide technical support to employees regarding software, hardware, and network-related issues.
details: Troubleshoot and resolve IT problems promptly to minimize downtime.
qualification: Experience in IT support and administration.

title: IT Engineer
description: Database management using MS SQL Server.
details: Server configuration and deployment with IIS Server.
qualification: Total work: 5 years (Preferred).

title: Frontend Engineer
description: Develop and maintain scalable, high-performance web applications that deliver seamless user experiences.
details: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement responsive, accessible, and user-centric interfaces using modern frontend frameworks.
qualification: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field; 4+ years of experience in frontend development.

title: Front End Developer
description: Design and develop dynamic, high-performing platforms using Next.js.
details: Collaborate with the team to create seamless user experiences, focusing on both UI/UX and backend functionality.
qualification: Minimum of 2 years of experience with Next.js or React-based frameworks.

title: Junior Front End Developer
description: Developing and maintaining web applications optimized for various devices and browsers.
details: Collaborate with designers and backend developers to create responsive and user-friendly web applications.
qualification: 1-3 years of experience in front-end development.

title: Front-end Developer
description: Develop front-end application features using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
details: Participate in requirement analysis, design, coding, implementation, and testing of web applications.
qualification: 3+ years of experience in front-end development with proficiency in modern frameworks.

title: FRONT-END DEVELOPER
description: Integrate front-end design into backend work and ensure responsive, clean code.
details: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality web applications.
qualification: Experience in front-end development with knowledge of web technologies.

title: Front-end Developer
description: Develop web applications using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.
details: Collaborate with product owners and technical leaders to implement responsive and user-centric interfaces.
qualification: 2-6 years of experience in front-end development.

title: Front End Developer
description: Design and develop web applications using AngularJS 6 or above.
details: Work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality and on-time delivery of web applications.
qualification: 5-8 years of experience in web application development with at least 5 years in AngularJS.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Develop and maintain user-facing features for web applications.
details: Collaborate with designers and backend developers to implement interactive and responsive web interfaces.
qualification: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and experience with modern frameworks like React or Angular.

title: Senior Front End Developer
description: Lead the development of complex web applications with a focus on performance and scalability.
details: Mentor junior developers and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.
qualification: 7+ years of experience in front-end development with expertise in JavaScript frameworks.

title: React.js Developer
description: Develop new user-facing features using React.js.
details: Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
qualification: Strong proficiency in JavaScript and experience with React.js.
